action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: An elderly man is eating a sandwich and holding a blue travel mug. He is sitting under a green canopy.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: The image shows two giraffes, an adult and a calf, walking together in a fenced enclosure with a dirt ground. The background features grassy areas and a few trees.

This is my DESCRIPTION: An elderly man is eating a sandwich and holding a blue travel mug. He is sitting under a green canopy.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there any human figure in your image?

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image shows two giraffes, an adult and a calf, walking together in a fenced enclosure with a dirt ground. The background features grassy areas and a few trees.
QUESTION: Is there any human figure in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the man in your image wearing a striped shirt?

ANSWER: No
QUESTION: Is the man in your image wearing a striped shirt? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: No
